A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed this movie. The great moments are as good as any in the series. The bad ones are still better than anything in the prequels. My guess: Those that don't like it are ticked their own predictions weren't met or guesses didn't come true. Doesn't mean it's a bad movie. I am trying to see where cinematically they think it's bad. Maybe the Finn and Rose story line? Mad props for taking chances. Another guess: there is a lot of sest up for the last movie.
